content: Hi :wave: I'm working on validating Questionnaires related to COVID-19 and hence use some of the prerelease LOINC codes. At the moment, the standard Java validator complains that these are not valid codes. I tried adding them as a CodeSystem supplement for LOINC and load that via the -ig parameter, but that did not work. Is there a way to avoid errors being generated for these codes (without using a custom terminology server)?
In short, no. Code system supplements can't define new codes and there's no way to introduce additional codes to an existing system via an IG artifact.
OK, thanks! - I guess the next LOINC release is close anyway.
